}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''[[Eumitcom]]''' WL11000P, [[Eumitcom WL11000]] on a PLX PCMCIA->PCI converter
*[[Eumitcom WL11000]] - PCMCIA Card (PRISM 2/2.5/3) *[[Eumitcom WL11000P]] - PCI Slot Adapter (PLX9052) :PCI ID: 0x1638:0x1100 ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1638/1100 PCI ID])
{{hostap_diag |nicid=8002 |pri_id=0015 |pri_ver=0.3.0 |sta_id=001f |sta_ver=1.7.1}} .. however, I did upgrade the STA firmware.
The PCMCIA module used with the adapter is 3.3V keyed.
==Links of Interest== :[http://gothmog.homeunix.net/blog/?p=78 3CRWE777A in NetBSD w/ OUI mention] :[http://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/linux-networking-3/redhat-9-0-3com-airconnect-3crwe777a-114501/ linux-wlan-ng log dump]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:3Com 3CRWE777A top.jpg|top File:3Com 3CRWE777A bot.jpg|bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== [http://www.34t.com/box-docs.asp?doc=808 ''Wireless Adapter Chipsets'' Table] * '''3Com 3CRWE777''' (PRISM 2.5 + PLX9052) :PCI ID: 10b7:7770 (3Com), SS ID: 0101:0777 :PCI\VEN_10B7&DEV_7770, PCI\VEN_10B7&DEV_1F1F *[[Addtron AWA-100]] - 0x1638:0x1100 ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1638/1100 PCI ID]) *[[Ericsson C11]] - WLAN Card - 0x016b:0x0001 (PRISM 2.5/Orinoco) :Ericsson DSSS Wireless LAN PCI Card - PCI\VEN_5401&DEV_0101 *[[Eumitcom WL11000]] - PCMCIA Card (PRISM 2/2.5/3) *[[Eumitcom WL11000P]] - PCI Slot Adapter (PLX9052) :PCI ID: 0x1638:0x1100 ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1638/1100 PCI ID]) *[[Belkin WL11000P]] - 0x1638:0x1100 (PLX9052) *[[Belkin F5D6020 v1]] - 0x01bf:0x2328 (PRISM 2) *[[SMC SMC2602W v1]] - 0x1638:0x1100 (PRISM 2) ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1638/1100 PCI ID]) *[[SMC SMC2632W v1]] - Wireless PC Card 0x0156:0x0002 (PRISM 2) *[[SMC SMC2652W]] AP - [[Eumitcom WL11000SA-N]]/[[Addtron AWS-100]] :[[Eumitcom WL11000-2]] PCMCIA Card (PRISM 2/2.5/3) *''Symbol LA-41x3'' - Spectrum24 Wireless LAN PCI Card - 0x1562:0x0001 :PCI\VEN_1562&DEV_0001&SUBSYS_00010001
